data.eml:eml: Spotted crake national survey in the UK in 1999

This is the first survey of spotted crakes Porzana porzana undertaken in Britain. English Nature (now Natural England) funded this survey as part of the Statutory Conservation Agencies RSPB Annual Breeding Birds Scheme (SCARABBS). Thanks are due to all County Bird Recorders, the Rare Breeding Birds Panel, and all those who took part in this survey.
